abilities.title: Lightweaving
abilities.description: Creates barriers of pure light that deflect physical and magical attacks.

abilities.title: Starbound Sprint
abilities.description: Moves at speeds that leave streaks of stardust in their wake.

abilities.title: Celestial Vision
abilities.description: Sees glimpses of the future through the alignment of stars.

encounters.outcome: Disappeared into a shimmering portal during a storm.
Observed fleeing into the sky during a solar eclipse.
